aWFRuleDesc.RuleText:
; aWF_RT_Formule (aEDA_ServiceActivityDescRuleEngine) (Def Version:2) (Implem Version:1)
class aWF_RT_Formule (aEDA_ServiceActivityDescRuleEngine)
uses aWF_PersonPortabilityRequest, aSF_Manage_LogOn, aEDA_Raise_ExternalEvent, aSLI_Manage_Actors, aSLI_Manage_Employee, aSLI_Consult_Policy, aSLI_Subscribe_LifePolicy, aSLI_Subscribe_Policy, aSLI_Consult_Product, aSLI_Manage_CustomerRequest, aSF_Manage_RequirementRequest, aSCB_Manage_Login, aSLI_Consult_LifePolicy, aSLI_Consult_Group, aSLI_Consult_Operations, aSLI_Manage_Payment, aSCB_Manage_BankMobility, aSLI_FR_Manage_DSN, aSLI_FR_ManageBill_DSN, aSH_ManageClaim, aSLIC_Manage_Claim, aSLIC_Consult_Claim, aSLIC_Manage_LifeClaim, aSLIC_Consult_LifeClaim, aSLI_Manage_TC, aSLI_Manage_ACORDTXLife, aSLI_Manage_GBPMember, aSLI_Endorse_Policy, aSCB_Consult_TodoList, aSLI_Manage_Accounting, aSLI_Subscribe_GBPContract, aSLI_Manage_Broker, aSCV_Subscribe_CashValuePolicy, aSLI_Subscribe_CommissionContract, aSPnC_Consult_Claim, aSPnC_Manage_Claim, aSCB_Manage_ConversionSystems, aSLI_Manage_Disbursement, aSHFR_ManageClaim, aSHFR_Consult_Claim, aSHFR_ManageNoemieRetour, aSHFR_UpdateThirdPartyOperation, aSF_ManageProcesses, aSF_Manage_Transactions, aSLIFR_Manage_SetPASRAUTaxRate, aSLI_Manage_Note, aSLI_Manage_ServiceProvider, aSCV_Consult_CashValuePolicy, aSCV_Endorse_Policy, aSLI_Endorse_LifePolicy, aSLI_Consult_CommissionContract, aSLI_Manage_GBPQuote, aSLI_Manage_GenericCensusLoad, aSLI_Manage_Report, aSLO_Consult_LoanPolicy, aSLO_Subscribe_LoanPolicy, aSPnC_Consult_PnCPolicy, aSPnC_Endorse_PnCPolicy, aSPnC_Subscribe_PnCPolicy, aTransaction, aListOfInstances, WFTypes, WF, aWF_DataRequestRoot
; Rule ; Classification function DemandedePortabilite return aWF_PersonPortabilityRequest if self.Master <> Nil return aWF_PersonPortabilityRequest(self.Master.OnObject) else return aWF_PersonPortabilityRequest(self.OnObject) endIf endFunc

function aSPnC_Subscribe_PnCPolicy return aSPnC_Subscribe_PnCPolicy _Result = self.GetBSForClassDef(218192257) endFunc
; FieldDesc ; VarDesc ; Indexes Of TableDesc procedure WFCalculate(inOut Result : Int4) uses SFBService, aWF_PolicyOwnershipPeriod, WFContract, aWFPerson, WLIContract, WLIClaim, aSetType
var newrequest : aWF_PersonPortabilityRequest var T : aTransaction var theList : aListOfInstances var PossibleStatus : tWFSubscribedEntityStatuses
T = SFBService.GetGlobalTransaction if (T <> Nil) and self.DemandedePortabilite.PrepareNewVersionForBatch(T, newrequest) new(theList) ; Person newrequest.Data.AppendObject(newrequest.OnObject) ; Contract WFTypes.SetAllInSetVar(PossibleStatus.type, @PossibleStatus) newrequest.OnObject._FillListWithContractsAtDateWithParametersOnOwner(theList, False, 0, True, cPOOC_PrimaryOwner, True, PossibleStatus, True, True, False) ; Disbursement newrequest.OnObject.FillListWithDisbursement(theList) ; Invoice newrequest.OnObject.FillListWithInvoice(theList) ; Payment newrequest.OnObject.FillListWithPayment(theList) ; Claim WLIClaim.FillListWithAllClaimsForPerson(theList, newrequest.OnObject) ; Member Contract WLIContract.FillListWithAllMemberContractsForPerson(theList, newrequest.OnObject) ;employment WLIContract.FillListWithAllEmploymentForPerson(theList, newrequest.OnObject) WF.AppendFirstListIntoSecond(theList, aListOfInstances(newrequest.Data)) newrequest.Status = psDataReceived dispose(theList) endIf endProc
aWFRuleDesc.Name: Portability Request Rule

aEDA_ActivityDescService.Name: Données Calcul Demande Portabilité
